2.description: Next, add the bolster at the base of the blade to strengthen the connection point between the blade and the handle. This crucial component not only enhances the structural integrity of the knife but also provides a smooth transition for the userâ€™s grip, ensuring both safety and comfort during use.

3.description: Finally, add the handle to the base of the bolster, ensuring it is securely attached to provide a comfortable grip for the user. This addition not only enhances the functionality of the knife, allowing for better control and maneuverability, but also completes the overall structure by connecting the blade and bolster, creating a cohesive and balanced design.
